problem_text_cn: 如图,为了测量油桶内油面的高度,将一根细木棒自油桶小孔,插入桶内测得木棒插入部分AB的长为100cm,木棒上沾油部分DB的长为60cm,桶高AC为80cm,那么桶内油面CE的高度是多少cm()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in order to measure the height of the oil surface in the oil barrel, insert a thin wooden stick from the small hole of the oil barrel and insert it into the barrel. The length of the insertion part AB of the stick is N_0, and the length of the oil part DB on the stick is N_1, the barrel height AC is N_2, then what is the height of the oil level CE in the barrel ()
raw_comment: 本题考查了相似三角形的应用；用到的知识点为:平行于三角形一边的直线与三角形另两边相交,截得的两三角形相似；相似三角形的对应边成比例．
